title: CollabHelper
description: AI-powered Cisco Collaboration assistant using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with FAISS and LangChain. Ask questions about CUCM, Unity, Webex, and other Cisco Collaboration tools and receive intelligent, context-aware answers.

title: FV Analyzer
description: Comprehensive financial planning suite featuring Future Value Calculator, Debt Snowball Calculator, Mortgage Payment Calculator with amortization schedules, and Retirement Savings Calculator. Built to help users make informed financial decisions.

title: Value Stock Analyzer
description: Real-time stock analysis tool for value investors. Instantly analyze publicly traded companies using key metrics like P/E Ratio and Return on Assets (ROA) to identify undervalued investment opportunities and assess operational efficiency.

title: Tampa Perfect Cleaning
description: Professional static website for Tampa Perfect Cleaning - a family-owned house cleaning service in Tampa Bay. Modern, responsive design with online booking integration, SEO optimization, and service area pages for Tampa, Land O Lakes, Wesley Chapel, Lutz, Odessa, and Zephyrhills.

title: CUCM Live Monitor
description: Real-time monitoring dashboard for Cisco Unified Communications Manager. Displays active calls, device registration status, individual phone call states, and cluster node health with WebSocket-based live updates every 5 seconds.

title: Webex AI Bot
description: Customizable Webex Teams bot powered by OpenAI's GPT models with configurable personalities. Choose from 9+ personality templates (Professional, TARS, Yoda, Pirate, etc.) or create your own. Docker-ready with simple environment variable configuration.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: Modern, minimalist portfolio website built with Astro and Tailwind CSS. Features dark aesthetic with emerald accents, smooth animations, and fully responsive design. Optimized for performance with static site generation and deployed on Cloudflare Pages CDN.
